attributes.name: max
attributes.desc: the maximum number of messages that can be displayed at the same time

attributes.name: grouping
attributes.desc: merge messages with the same content, type of VNode message is not supported(2.8.2)

attributes.name: duration
attributes.desc: display duration, millisecond. If set to 0, it will not turn off automatically(2.8.2)

attributes.name: showClose
attributes.desc: whether to show a close button(2.8.2)

attributes.name: offset
attributes.desc: set the distance to the top of viewport(2.8.2)

attributes.name: placement
attributes.optionValue: top | top-left | top-right | bottom | bottom-left | bottom-right
